version_description:
• Fixes a syncing bug that would break Moment Family for new families

I'm really sorry about this bug :-(

• Fixes a syncing bug that would break Moment Family for new families

I'm really sorry about this bug :-(

• Fixes a syncing bug that would break Moment Family for new families

I'm really sorry about this bug :-(

Little Changes
• Rate limits the Battery screenshot reminder. Moment won't constantly bother you now if you skip one.
• Fixes an app tracking bug for days before October 9th.
• Updates average daily phone use stats.
• Refreshes your stats page every 24 hours.
• Fixes the calculation of your average screen time and average pickups per day when you're excluding certain apps from counting.
• Only showing the 'How To Track Apps' modal when you're relatively new to the feature. Grizzled veterans don't need it any more.

If you've found Moment useful for your family, I'd love it if you left a review in the App Store. Rock on!

If you've found Moment useful for your family, I'd love it if you left a review in the App Store. Rock on!

Introducing Insights - Dive deeper into your screen time to spot trends. Screen time, pickups, most used apps: it's all there on pretty graphs. I even added a stat you're going to love to hate: what % of your waking life you spend on your phone. So far, the average across every Moment user is 20.8% of your day on your phone. How do you think you compare?


Smaller changes
• Improves tracking accuracy
• Easier to take your Battery screenshots
• Lots of bug fixes


If you've found Moment helpful, or think it will be for your family, you can help support it by rating it in the App Store. Enjoy the moment :-)

• Stability improvements. Moment does a better job of running in the background and automatically restarting.
• Improved error handling when something goes wrong with a Battery screenshot.

• Lots of little changes and bug fixes

If you've found Moment useful, it would be a huge favor to me if you rated the app in the App Store. You're so cool :-)

• Stability improvements. Moment does a better job of running in the background and automatically restarting.

• Lots of little changes and bug fixes

If you've found Moment useful, it would be a huge favor to me if you rated the app in the App Store. You're so cool :-)

Big changes
======================
• Screen time tracking now works in Airplane Mode
• Plays annoying audio when you’re over your limit
• Tap and drag on an Insight graph to view the exact stats from that day


Smaller changes
----------------------
- Adds haptic feedback throughout the app
- “Pro Features” are now called “Moment Premium”
- Getting Started guide
- Properly ignores certain apps from your Insights
- Adds an “Other” gender and lets you pick your preferred gender pronoun
- Fixes bugs and crashes




If you've found Moment helpful, or think it will be for your family, you can help support it by rating it in the App Store. Enjoy the moment :-)

• New Bored & Brilliant course


Small changes
----------------------
- View more stats while you're going through a course (screen time, # of pickups, % of your waking life you're on your phone, and sleep)
- Establish a baseline screen time from day 1, even going back in time to the week before you installed Moment
- Fixes issue with loading on Apple Watch
- Silent daily limit sound


If you've found Moment useful for your family, I'd love it if you left a review in the App Store. Thanks so much!

Fixes a crash on iOS 11. Sorry about that!
Fixes a crash on iOS 11. Sorry about that!
Fixes a crash on iOS 11. Sorry about that!

Moment 4.0 is here!

Big changes
• Redesigned main screen with a focus on pickups too
• 4 new Moment Coach courses
- Better Sleep
- Attention Span
- Family Intro
- Mini Detox
• Set pickup and screen time goals (replacing the old Daily Limits)
• Moment Family is now free
• Moment Coach subscription
• Better first run experience

Small changes
- Lots of bug fixes
- iOS 12 improvements



If you've found Moment helpful, you can help support it by rating this new version in the App Store. Thanks! Enjoy the moment :-)

Small Changes
• Brings back the big Screen Time stat and the red, yellow, and green colors to let you know how you're doing today in relation to your goal.
• Adds a bar chart of your screen time in this past week. We've been calling it "This Week In Screen Time."
• Fixes a few bugs that would cause the app to crash.


Thank you to all of your who wrote into our support or wrote an App Store review with your feedback. We're listening and constantly improving Moment. Bring it on if you have more feedback!

If you've found Moment useful, it would be a huge favor to us if you rated the app in the App Store. You're so cool! :-)

Moment can now rescue you from a rabbit hole! When you use your phone for more than 15 minutes at a time, you'll have the option to set a healthy replacement app that Moment will nudge you towards. Think meditation instead of social media News Feeds.

Introducing the Phone Fasting feature! Break up with your phone (sometimes). It's not you, it's me.

Start a phone fast to commit to putting down your phone for some amount of time. This is especially important in the presence of family and friends.

Stay safe and happy holidays from the entire Moment team!

Fixes bug with selecting your Phone Fast length. You were forced to fast for exactly one hour, no more, no less. That's a less than optimal experience and you deserve better. You can now rightfully choose whatever works best for you!

Enjoy that freedom, but use it wisely. With great UI power comes great responsibility.

Introducing the Moment app for your Apple Watch. Start a phone fast from your wrist, and monitor your progress with a complication.

While you're not fasting, your complication will show how much of your day as been "in the moment." It's a fun thing to try to keep as high as you can throughout the day.
